oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-04-27 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 27, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Hank Snow (host/performer), guest performer T. Texas Tyler, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chubby Wise, Chet Atkins, June Carter, and Stringbean. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 916th broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: June Carter; T. Texas Tyler; Stringbean; Hank Snow
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Hank Snow introduces June Carter -- Comedy routine (June Carter, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Hank Snow) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Hank Snow introduces T. Texas Tyler -- The Deck Of Cards (T. Texas Tyler) -- Hank Snow introduces Stringbean -- Pretty Little Pink (Stringbean) -- Grant Turner announces schedules for Hank Snow and Jim Reeves -- Hank Snow talks -- Just A Faded Petal From A Beautiful Bouquet (Hank Snow) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Hank Snow) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Atkins, Chet; Wise, Chubby; Stringbean, 1915-1973; Cash, June Carter, 1929-2003; Snow, Hank; Tyler, T. Texas
